content: after the successful release of the popular ice ice baby cardigan dorine has designed another super soft cardigan using our durable velvet yarn this time it s a short cardigan that can also be worn as a jacket when it s a little chilly outside like the ice ice baby cardigan this cardigan is also made to measure durable velvet is available in 32 colors the samples are made with 396 lavender 282 light blue and 2137 mint yarn durable velvet 100% polyester 100g/180m design dorine brökling | op de haakwolk
